SENT.plain: A 43-year-old Chinese patient with a history of psoriasis developed fulminant ulcerative colitis after immunosuppressive therapy for steroid-resistant minimal change disease was stopped
Minimal change disease in association with inflammatory bowel disease is a rare condition
We here report a case showing an association between ulcerative colitis, minimal change disease, and psoriasis
The possible pathological link between 3 diseases is discussed
